title: the following order applies, and having consulted with the Minister for Children,
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (International Protection 
Appeals Tribunal) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 31 December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (international protection appeal tribunal) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 31 december 2020

title: the following order applies, and having consulted with the Minister for Children,
heading: 2. The International Protection Appeals Tribunal is designated for the
text_raw:
2. The International Protection Appeals Tribunal is designated for the 
purposes of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [714] 3
